author: Reuters Editorial
title: Zona euro, Eurostat conferma crescita trim4 0,6% su trimestre, 2,7% su anno
text: BRUSSELS, March 7 (Reuters) - European statistics agency Eurostat confirmed its estimate that gross domestic product (GDP) in the euro zone grew by 0.6 percent in the fourth quarter of 2017, compared to the previous three months. It also confirmed its estimate that the year-on-year increase was 2.7 percent.
